text: The Alexander Dennis Enviro100EV is a battery electric midibus. It has a low- floor. It has been made from 2023 to the present day by Alexander Dennis. The body of the bus is made in Zhuhai in China, The chassis of the bus is made at the Alexander Dennis factory in Scarborough in England. == Enviro100AEV == From 2023 to the present day, Alexander Dennis made a Enviro100 autonomous bus called the Enviro100AEV (short for Autonomous Electric Vehicle). == References == == Other websites == * Enviro100EV product descriptions Enviro100EV Category:Low-floor buses Category:Midibuses Category:Battery electric buses
title: Alexander Dennis Enviro100EV
